timeline_events.title: Meeting 2
timeline_events.description: Shared baseline alignment and working agreements confirmation.

timeline_events.title: Meeting 4
timeline_events.description: Recommendations outline and risk register checkpoint.

timeline_events.title: Meeting 5
timeline_events.description: Draft recommendations workshop and integration sequencing.

timeline_events.title: Draft sections complete
timeline_events.description: Initial domain draft package is complete for integration.

timeline_events.title: Meeting 6
timeline_events.description: Near-final package integration and comms/implementation alignment.

timeline_events.title: Board-ready package
timeline_events.description: Board-ready recommendation package is assembled for final review.

timeline_events.title: Meeting 7
timeline_events.description: Presentation prep and final review feedback assimilation.

deliverables.title: Working agreements and collaboration operating rules
Recommendations outline and first-pass risk register
AI Tool Review Checklist v1 + Risk Tiers
Draft sections for priority recommendation domains
Final talk track and Q&A prep

issues.message: SoR workstream IDs and doc-extracted WS-* IDs are not fully aligned.

categories.schedule: Timeline and readiness metrics for near-term execution.
categories.convergence: Internal consistency and linkage quality across SoR and docs.
categories.freshness: How recent SoR and supporting documents are.

kpis.name: Next gate readiness
kpis.description: Share of deliverables due before next gate that are complete.

kpis.name: Overdue deliverables
kpis.description: Count and severity of overdue deliverables.
rules: Penalty combines overdue count and max overdue days.

kpis.name: Pre-read readiness
kpis.description: Readiness of pre-read deliverables for the next gate.
rules: No explicit pre-read fields in timeline; KPI is not instrumented.

kpis.name: SoR reference integrity
kpis.description: No dangling IDs across SoR references.
rules: ID-* issues from quality report reduce score.

kpis.name: Ownership completeness
kpis.description: Deliverables and workstreams have assigned owners/leads.

kpis.name: Gate mapping completeness
kpis.description: Deliverables map to valid timeline checkpoints.
rules: Missing or invalid checkpoint mappings reduce score.

kpis.name: DoD completeness and placeholder-free
kpis.description: Definition-of-done is sufficiently detailed and not placeholder text.

kpis.name: Principle linkage coverage
rules: Coverage = deliverables with principle_refs / total deliverables.

kpis.name: Risk linkage coverage
rules: Coverage = deliverables with risk_refs / total deliverables.

kpis.name: Cross-doc principle coverage
kpis.description: Percent of scanned docs that reference at least one principle ID.

kpis.name: Cross-doc risk coverage
kpis.description: Percent of scanned docs that reference at least one risk ID.

kpis.name: Riskprinciple mapping readiness
kpis.description: Coverage of risk IDs linked to principle IDs.
rules: No risk register found; KPI not instrumented.

kpis.name: Milestone gating consistency
kpis.description: Deliverables are checkpointed against milestone gates.
rules: Deliverables should be mapped to ms_* checkpoint IDs when applicable.

kpis.name: SoR recency
kpis.description: SoR files updated within freshness window.
rules: Files older than 7 days are stale.

kpis.name: Public artifacts recency
kpis.description: Derived public artifacts are freshly generated.
rules: Public artifacts should be updated within 7 days.

kpis.name: Foundation docs recency
kpis.description: Recency profile for governance_docs and project_files updates.
rules: If no foundation docs updated in >14 days => yellow; >30 days => red.

kpis.name: Public link hygiene
kpis.description: Deliverables must have public_url or committee_only=true.

kpis.name: PII lint
kpis.description: Public outputs should not include email addresses.
rules: Any email-like token in public/*.json is red.

meta.description: Expanded evidence payload keyed by KPI id.
